ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE bill_detail_id = values(bill_detail_id), bill_ym = values(bill_ym), bill_id = values(bill_id), bill_template_id = values(bill_template_id), emp_id = values(emp_id), client_id = values(client_id), previous_send_id = values(previous_send_id), city_id = values(city_id), sb_ym = values(sb_ym), server_ym = values(server_ym), policy_group_id = values(policy_group_id), prod_id = values(prod_id), is_sum = values(is_sum), is_one_off = values(is_one_off), amount = values(amount), amount_e = values(amount_e), amount_p = values(amount_p), base_e = values(base_e), base_p = values(base_p), ratio_e = values(ratio_e), ratio_p = values(ratio_p), add_amt_e = values(add_amt_e), add_amt_p = values(add_amt_p), contract_id = values(contract_id), contract_type = values(contract_type), second_contract_id = values(second_contract_id), red_flag = values(red_flag), remark = values(remark), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), create_user_id = values(create_user_id), create_date = values(create_date), update_user_id = values(update_user_id), update_date = values(update_date), order_id = values(order_id), employee_rec_id = values(employee_rec_id), city_name = values(city_name), cert_id = values(cert_id), cert_type = values(cert_type), prod_name = values(prod_name)
mapper.select: select sb.*, p.base_info_id personId, p.employee_name employeeName , p.card_id certId, p.card_type certType,p.work_city workLocation from ef_arap_detail_emp_sb sb left join bd_emp_base_info p on sb.emp_id=p.base_info_id where sb.is_deleted=0 and sb.bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select distinct prod_id prodId,prod_name prodName from ef_arap_detail_emp_sb where bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by prod_id
